pages.title: Computer
pages.text: The personal workstation of the LogiCore network. While it lacks the raw parallel processing power of a $(l:logicore:machines/server_rack)Server Rack$(), the Computer is a reliable entry-level machine for generating $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$().

pages.title: System Requirements
pages.text: To function, the Computer requires a valid $(l:logicore:components/processor_unit)Processor Unit$() installed in its chassis and a connection to a power source via $(l:logicore:components/data_cable)Data Cable$().$(br)$(br)$(l)Performance:$()$(br)Expect lower cycle generation rates compared to industrial hardware.

pages.title: Redstone Control
pages.text: The Computer features a standard hardware interrupt port.$(br)$(br)Applying a $(l)redstone signal$() will force the system into standby mode. While in standby, the machine stops generating $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$() but also halts all energy consumption.
A compact chassis capable of housing standard processor units.
